channel.title: RackFlux or Whynotavps?
channel.description:
hello Moparscape i am buying a VPS and i want to know which one is better RackFlux or Whynotavps...
Other info: im using SSH client CentOS
here are the websites if you need it www.whynotavps.com www.rackflux.com

item.title: RackFlux or Whynotavps?
item.dc:creator: @leapswitch leapswitch
item.description:
@leapswitch wrote:

[quote=“Bludstained, post:4, topic:463938”]DO NOT USE WHYNOTAVPS.

They charged me, and when i couldn’t get there vps up and running properly they offered to refund me, and when i agreed they just quit giving me any information on the refund and began ignoring me. Horrible VPS services.[/quote]

Dear Bludstained,
I am Ishan from Leapswitch Networks. We recently purchased WhyNotavps.com and all its clients/servers. I would like to personally apologize for your experience. I would not be able to refund your payment which was made to the previous owner, however we can offer you 3 months free VPS in any of our locations (USA, India, Spain, Portugal, Ukraine, Germany). You can PM me/ email me - ishan at leapswitch dot com

Read full topic

item.title: RackFlux or Whynotavps?
item.dc:creator: @Nice_Boots Nice Boots
item.description:
@Nice_Boots wrote:

[quote=“Bludstained, post:6, topic:463938”]Im currently using this, GREAT GREAT Service, easy to get them up and running, nice windows VPS easy to control and manage.

http://www.accuwebhosting.com/[/quote]

to espensive bro, rackflux has 750mb of ram for 8 dollars a month.

Read full topic

AccuWeb provides feature-packed Windows VPS and Cloud web hosting services with remote desktop access, shared hosting, and asp.net hosting on both SSD and Classic server.
